text:
[Verse]
Stars up in the sky
City lights pass by
Riding through the night
Feel the beat so high

[Verse 2]
Wheels on the road
In the cool night's glow
Heartbeat syncs with the sound
Never slowing down

[Chorus]
Midnight ride we fly
To the moon up high
Dancing in the dark
Following a spark

[Verse 3]
Wind in my hair
With you everywhere
Music fills the air
No worries no care

[Chorus]
Midnight ride we fly
To the moon up high
Dancing in the dark
Following a spark

[Bridge]
Every turn we take
A brand new chance to make
Memories in the night
Holding on so tight
title: The Midnight Ride
